mapper.sql: pk_student, pk_domain, student_class, code, caption, short_caption, short_code, sex, birthday, nation, isminority, isreligion, religion, passport_no, passport_date, study_abroad_fee, img, schoolrool, schoolrool_address, student_id, in_state, teacher_appraisal, graduation_go, mental_health, healthy_body, situation_analysis, letter, planning, parent_feedback, nationality, mother_lan, id_kind, id_card, id_address, green_card, green_card_country, old_place, old_sclool, grade, phone, email, fax, zip, address, hobby, isboarding, tracksource, source, appraisal, dream, parents_expect, memo, pk_sys_user, first_sys_user, isvalid, istype, changer, changedate, state, creator, creation_date, modifier, lastedit_date, password, company,program, branch,is_schoolrool,is_byschoolbus,dorm_room,school_bus,will_course,will_rank,will_lesson, target,course_type,class_type,teacher_request,subject_basis,english_level,learning_habits,read_state, lastlogin_date, parent_name, parent_phone, stu_school, qq, province, city, area, zip_code, more_detail, grade_num,shoe_size,height,body_weight,bust,waistline,pk_classinfo
mapper.select:
select
from student where pk_student in (SELECT pk_student from receivable where `status` =0) AND istype != 0

SELECT * FROM student AS s WHERE s.pk_student IN ( SELECT cs.pk_student FROM classinfo_student AS cs WHERE cs.pk_classinfo IN ( SELECT ce.pk_classinfo FROM classinfo_employee AS ce WHERE ce.pk_employee = #{pkEmployee} ) )

select
from student WHERE pk_student in (SELECT pk_student from student_linkman where pk_linkman=#{pkLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR});

select left(student_id,4) frontword from student where pk_student in (SELECT pk_student from classinfo_student where pk_classinfo=#{pkClassinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) group by left(student_id,4) HAVING count(0)>1 order by count(0) DESC limit 1
SELECT right(student_id,6) from student where left(student_id,4)= #{startCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY right(student_id,6) desc LIMIT 1
